languages.text: {n}Умолкнув, Заря некоторое время рассматривает вас, а затем довольно произносит:{/n} "Ты ведь чувствуешь, что мои слова истинны, не так ли? Ты достаточно размягчил{mf||а} свою душу, и теперь она чувствует поступь перемен почти так же ясно, как и моя".

{n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."
languages.original_text: {n}Умолкнув, Заря некоторое время рассматривает вас, а затем довольно произносит:{/n} "Ты ведь чувствуешь, что мои слова истинны, не так ли? Ты достаточно размягчил{mf||а} свою душу, и теперь она чувствует поступь перемен почти так же ясно, как и моя".

traits.locale_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the approach of changes."

{n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the approach of changes."

{n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

{n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

languages.text: {n}Nachdem Aurora schließt, mustert sie dich eine Weile stumm und sagt dann in zufriedenem Ton:{/n} "Ihr spürt die Wahrheit meiner Worte, nicht wahr? Ihr habt Eurer Seele genug Härte genommen, dass sie den Wandel kommen spürt, fast so deutlich wie meine eigene."
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem Aurora schließt, mustert sie dich eine Weile stumm und sagt dann in zufriedenem Ton:{/n} "Ihr spürt die Wahrheit meiner Worte, nicht wahr? Ihr habt Eurer Seele genug Härte genommen, dass sie den Wandel kommen spürt, fast so deutlich wie meine eigene."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir terminé, Aurore vous observe en silence, puis ajoute d'une voix satisfaite :{/n} « Vous ressentez la vérité dans mes paroles, je me trompe ? Vous avez suffisamment assoupli votre âme pour cela... Vous sentez l'approche de grands changements presque aussi clairement que moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir terminé, Aurore vous observe en silence, puis ajoute d'une voix satisfaite :{/n} « Vous ressentez la vérité dans mes paroles, je me trompe ? Vous avez suffisamment assoupli votre âme pour cela... Vous sentez l'approche de grands changements presque aussi clairement que moi. »

languages.text: {n}“极光”说完之后，默默地观察了你一会儿，然后愉悦地开了口。{/n}“你已经意识到我说的是真相，不是吗？你的灵魂已经软化、动摇。你和我一样，已经渐渐清楚地意识到，变革即将到来。”
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}‘极光’说完之后，默默地观察了你一会儿，然后愉悦地开了口。{/n}“你已经意识到我说的是真相，不是吗？你的灵魂已经软化、动摇。你和我一样，已经渐渐清楚地意识到，变革即将到来。”

languages.text: {n}オーロラは話し終えると、しばらくこちらをジッと見て、満足気に言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「私の言葉が真実である感じているのだろう？貴様はそう感じられるほど魂を柔軟にしており、私と同じくらい明瞭に分かっている。変化は近づいているのだと」
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}オーロラは話し終えると、しばらくこちらをジッと見て、満足気に言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「私の言葉が本当の事だと感じているだろう？貴様はそう感じられるほど魂を柔軟にして、私と同じくらいハッキリ分かっている。変化に近づいているのだ」

languages.text: {n}Cuando Aurora termina, te observa silenciosa durante un rato y dice con voz de satisfacción,{/n} «Puedes sentir la verdad de mis palabras, ¿verdad? Has ablandado tu alma lo suficiente para que perciba, casi tan claramente como la mía, los cambios que se avecinan».
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Aurora termina, te observa silenciosa durante un rato y dice con voz de satisfacción,{/n} «Puedes sentir la verdad de mis palabras, ¿verdad? Has ablandado tu alma lo suficiente para que perciba, casi tan claramente como la mía, la proximidad de los cambios».

languages.text: {n}Aurora, lafını bitirdikten sonra bir müddet sessizce seni süzüp hâlinden memnun bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Sözlerimin ardındaki hakikati gördün, değil mi? Ruhunu, gelmekte olan değişimleri algılayabilecek kadar yumuşatmayı başardın. Tıpkı benim gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}After Aurora finishes, she studies you silently for a while and says in a pleased voice,{/n} "You can sense the truth of my words, can you not? You have softened your soul enough for it to sense, almost as clearly as mine does, the coming changes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aurora, lafını bitirdikten sonra sessizce seni süzüp memnun olduğunu belli eden bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Sözlerimin ardındaki hakikati gördün, değil mi? Ruhunu, gelmekte olan değişimleri algılayabilecek kadar yumuşatmayı başardın. Tıpkı benim gibi."
